text: The beauty of a strong, lasting commitment is often best understood by men incapable of it.
author: Murray Kempton

text: Commitment means that it is possible for a man to yield the nerve center of his consent to a purpose or cause, a movement or an ideal, which may be more important to him than whether he lives or dies.
author: Howard Thurman

text: Men are actually the weaker sex.
author: George Weinberg

text: Either men will learn to live like brothers, or they will die like beasts.
author: Max Lerner

text: Men, who are rogues individually, are in the mass very honorable people.
author: Charles de Secondat
